dev/lsf/asio/sockaddr.hpp

00001 // File:        sockaddr.hpp
00002 // Description: ---
00003 // Notes:       ---
00004 // Author:      leoxiang <leoxiang727@qq.com>
00005 // Revision:    2012-06-07 by leoxiang
00006 
00007 #pragma once
00008 #include <sys/types.h>
00009 #include <sys/socket.h>
00010 #include <arpa/inet.h>
00011 #include <netinet/in.h>
00012 #include "lsf/basic/type_cast.hpp"
00013 #include "lsf/util/string_ext.hpp"
00014 #include "lsf/asio/address.hpp"
00015 
00016 namespace lsf {
00017 namespace asio {
00018 
00020 // SockAddr
00022 namespace { static const char* DEF_DELIMIT = "|"; }
00023 
00024 class SockAddr {
00025 public:
00026     using sockaddr_type = union {
00027         sockaddr base;
00028         sockaddr_in v4;
00029         sockaddr_in6 v6;
00030     };
00031 
00032 public:
00034     // static function
00035     static SockAddr Any(proto::Domain domain = proto::v4) { return SockAddr(domain); }
00036 
00038     // constructor
00039     SockAddr(proto::Domain domain = proto::v4) : SockAddr(Address(domain), 0) { }
00040 
00041     SockAddr(std::string const& str)
00042         : SockAddr(Address(util::StringExt::SplitGet(str, DEF_DELIMIT, 0)),
00043                    basic::TypeCast<uint16_t>(util::StringExt::SplitGet(str, DEF_DELIMIT, 1))) {}
00044 
00045     SockAddr(Address const& address, uint16_t port) : _domain(address.domain()) {
00046         if (IsV4()) {
00047             _sockaddr.v4.sin_family = AF_INET;
00048             _sockaddr.v4.sin_port = ::htons(port);
00049             ::memcpy(&_sockaddr.v4.sin_addr, &address._address, sizeof(_sockaddr.v4.sin_addr));
00050         } else {
00051             _sockaddr.v6.sin6_family = AF_INET6;
00052             _sockaddr.v6.sin6_port = ::htons(port);
00053             _sockaddr.v6.sin6_flowinfo = 0;
00054             ::memcpy(&_sockaddr.v6.sin6_addr, &address._address, sizeof(_sockaddr.v6.sin6_addr));
00055         }
00056     }
00057 
00058     SockAddr(sockaddr const* paddr) : _domain(paddr->sa_family) {
00059         ::memcpy(&_sockaddr, paddr, sizeof(_sockaddr));
00060     }
00061 
00063     // member function
00064     std::string ToString() const { return GetAddress().ToString() + DEF_DELIMIT + basic::TypeCast<std::string>(GetPort()); }
00065 
00066     uint16_t GetPort() const {
00067         if (IsV4()) return ::ntohs(_sockaddr.v4.sin_port);
00068         else        return ::ntohs(_sockaddr.v6.sin6_port);
00069     }
00070     Address GetAddress() const {
00071         if (IsV4()) return Address(_sockaddr.v4.sin_addr);
00072         else        return Address(_sockaddr.v6.sin6_addr);
00073     }
00074 
00075     bool IsV4() const { return _domain.IsV4(); }
00076     bool IsV6() const { return _domain.IsV6(); }
00077 
00078     bool operator==(SockAddr const& rhs) const {
00079         if (IsV4()) return _sockaddr.v4.sin_family == rhs._sockaddr.v4.sin_family &&
00080                            _sockaddr.v4.sin_addr.s_addr == rhs._sockaddr.v4.sin_addr.s_addr &&
00081                            _sockaddr.v4.sin_port == rhs._sockaddr.v4.sin_port;
00082         else        return _sockaddr.v6.sin6_family == rhs._sockaddr.v6.sin6_family &&
00083                            _sockaddr.v6.sin6_port == rhs._sockaddr.v6.sin6_port &&
00084                            _sockaddr.v6.sin6_flowinfo == rhs._sockaddr.v6.sin6_flowinfo &&
00085                            ::memcmp(&_sockaddr.v6.sin6_addr, &_sockaddr.v6.sin6_addr, sizeof(_sockaddr.v6.sin6_addr));
00086     }
00087     bool operator!=(SockAddr const& rhs) const { return !(*this == rhs); }
00088 
00089     sockaddr const* data() const { return &_sockaddr.base; }
00090     socklen_t size() const { return IsV4() ? sizeof(_sockaddr.v4) : sizeof(_sockaddr.v6); }
00091 
00092 private:
00093     proto::Domain _domain;
00094     sockaddr_type _sockaddr;
00095 };
00096 
00097 }  // end of namespace asio
00098 }  // end of namespace lsf
00099
